target_markets.market_description: Canadian entrepreneurs and international startup founders seeking Silicon Valley-style business operations
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions coaching clients in Canada, suggests widespread misunderstanding of Silicon Valley business practices

problems_validated.problem: Most people outside Silicon Valley don't understand what it's like to run a tech startup or achieve product-market fit
problems_validated.severity: High - affects ability to build successful businesses
problems_validated.current_solutions: Reading blog posts and Twitter for startup advice
problems_validated.market_gap: Blog posts and social media don't provide the experiential knowledge needed

products_tools.name: Remote hiring/international teams
products_tools.use_case: Building distributed teams with Silicon Valley leadership
products_tools.metrics: raised quarter billion dollars across ventures

business_strategies.strategy: Hire Silicon Valley-experienced leaders to create culture core, then hire internationally for other roles
business_strategies.implementation: Get leaders from companies like Zynga, Amazon, PayPal to establish culture, then expand team globally
business_strategies.expected_results: Team gets head start on Silicon Valley-style operations and work ethic
business_strategies.case_study: Speaker's current company with Andreessen Horowitz funding

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage currency arbitrage for extended runway
business_strategies.implementation: Raise in USD, operate in countries with favorable exchange rates
business_strategies.expected_results: 35% more runway (10M USD becomes 13.5M CAD equivalent)
business_strategies.case_study: Current market conditions with USD/CAD exchange

problems_solutions.problem: Remote team collaboration and culture building
problems_solutions.solution: Create core of Silicon Valley-experienced leaders to establish culture
steps: Hire proven Silicon Valley leaders first
Use them to establish work culture and standards
Leaders mentor and guide international team members

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Thinking you understand Silicon Valley business operations from reading blog posts and Twitter
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing crucial experiential knowledge about product-market fit and operational intensity
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Get actual experience or hire people with proven Silicon Valley track records
mistakes_to_avoid.example: People in Canada thinking they know how to run Silicon Valley businesses without the experience

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not recognizing when you have product-market fit
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Can't properly chase or optimize for it
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Understand it's a 'crazy clear feeling' - if you're unsure, you don't have it
mistakes_to_avoid.example: When asked if they have product-market fit, people say 'I think so' - which means they don't

metrics_kpis.benchmark: Should be a 'crazy clear feeling' when achieved
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Experiential - you know definitively when you have it
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: If you're unsure whether you have it, you don't have it

trends_signals.trend: VC market hurting, especially B2B businesses
trends_signals.opportunity: Enterprises cutting software spend, next wave will hit B2C companies
Economic conditions creating challenges but also currency arbitrage opportunities

actionable_quotes.quote: if you've never had that experience before you don't know how to chase up you don't know when you have it
actionable_quotes.actionability: Seek experience with product-market fit or hire those who have it

actionable_quotes.quote: these [Silicon Valley people] know how to work and they know how to make progress
actionable_quotes.context: Explaining value of Silicon Valley-experienced team members
actionable_quotes.actionability: Prioritize hiring people with proven Silicon Valley experience for key roles

actionable_quotes.quote: as long as you don't run out of cash you're doing something smart you've extended your Runway
actionable_quotes.actionability: Consider geographic arbitrage for extending runway

key_statistics.statistic: Raised quarter billion dollars across ventures

meta.title: Info Diets, OG Content Creators, and 7-year Lifespans
